pullRequest.body:
Change `group` calls to `simp [mul_assoc]` or similar:
* when low in the import hierarchy
* and add a comment at each such site to this effect.

[Zulip](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/144837-PR-reviews/topic/.2321296.20don't.20import.20Ring.20in.20GroupTheory.2ECommutator.2EBasic)

Issue is here: #21324

> Issue is here: #21324

For reference, I added the comment below also to the issue:

> It looks like the implementation of group involves defining (implicitly) a simp-set. Would it not be possible to define the tactic and a partial simp-set that does not require ring, and add the ring-based lemmas to the Ring file and make them part of the group simp-set?
I'm happy with moving the "heavy" functionality of `group` into a differently named tactic, but I don't want to remove `group` even if it is just `simp` with a small simp-set.

Per [Zulip](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/144837-PR-reviews/topic/.2321296.20don't.20import.20Ring.20in.20GroupTheory.2ECommutator.2EBasic/near/497408045), this doesn't depend on #21360 anymore.
